settings.themeTooltip: Choose the app theme: System (follows your OS preferences), Light or Dark.
settings.autoCloseOnBlurTooltip: Automatically closes the overlay window when you click outside. Useful for keeping your workspace clean.
settings.globalShortcutTooltip: Set a key combination to show/hide the overlay from anywhere. Works even when the app is in the background.
settings.captureTooltip: Click and press your key combination to record it automatically.
settings.unsupportedKey: Key not supported for a global shortcut
settings.enableAutostartTooltip: Automatically launches the app in the background when your computer starts. The overlay remains accessible via the keyboard shortcut.
settings.enableSoundEffectsTooltip: Plays subtle sounds when creating, completing or deleting tasks for pleasant audio feedback.
settings.sortModeTooltip: Task display order: by date added, alphabetical, due date, or manual (drag & drop).
settings.languageTooltip: Choose the app's display language. "Auto" automatically detects your system language on first launch.
settings.labelsTooltip: Labels let you categorize and filter your tasks by color. Create labels to organize your work (e.g., Urgent, Personal, Work).
settings.addLabelTooltip: Create a new custom label with a name and color of your choice.
settings.synchronizationTooltip: Sync your tasks across multiple devices via the cloud. Your data remains encrypted and accessible from anywhere.
settings.localDataTooltip: Location of the JSON file containing all your tasks and settings on this device. Useful for manual backups.
settings.openDataFileTooltip: Opens the data file in your file explorer or default editor.
settings.logsTooltip: Technical log file containing the app's events and errors. Useful for debugging and technical support.
settings.openLogFileTooltip: Opens the log file in your file explorer or default editor.
settings.versionTooltip: Current app version number. Format: major.minor.patch (e.g., 0.2.3).
settings.checkForUpdatesTooltip: Checks if a new version of the app is available on GitHub. You'll be notified if an update exists.
settings.dangerZoneWarning: This action will delete all your data and reset the app to its initial state. This action is irreversible.
settings.deleteAllDataTooltip: ⚠️ WARNING: Permanently deletes all your tasks, lists, labels and settings. No automatic backup is created. This action is irreversible!
settings.deleteAllDataDescription: This action is irreversible and will delete all your tasks and settings.
settings.confirmDeleteDesc: This action is irreversible. All your tasks, lists, labels and settings will be permanently deleted.
